vulnerability_remidation: Disable the suggestion feature if possible in the GraphQL implementation used, or try to consider using one which allows this to be done
vulnerability_description: If introspection is disabled on the target, Field Suggestion can allow users to still earn information on the GraphQL schema. By default, GraphQL backends have a feature for fields and operations suggestions.If we try to query a field but we have made a typo, GraphQL will attempt to suggest fields that are similar to the initial attempt
impact: By leveraging this capability, an attacker could conduct a bruteforce attack to discover the GraphQL schema and potential hidden or private endpoints, and could try accessing sensitive information or performing arbitrary actions on the target server
